name: mySmarthomeVoice
0:
”Alexa, turn on bedroom light”
”Alexa, dim bedroom light”
”Alexa, turn off bedroom light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Amazon Alexa and the Hauppauge mySmarthome Voice devices work together to help you control your home lighting and small home appliances (fans, etc.) You can ask Alexa to turn on a light (Alexa, turn on the living room light ) or to dim one of the mySmarthome Voice LED lightbulbs (Alexa, dim the living room light).
